thread.title: MURS Hitting Webster Hall in NYC on November 7 For is Have A Nice Life Tour 2015
thread.title_full: MURS Hitting Webster Hall in NYC on November 7 For is Have A Nice Life Tour 2015

author: Editorial Dept
title: MURS Hitting Webster Hall in NYC on November 7 For is Have A Nice Life Tour 2015
text:
Home / Artists / MURS Hitting Webster Hall in NYC on November 7 For is Have A Nice Life Tour 2015 MURS Hitting Webster Hall in NYC on November 7 For is Have A Nice Life Tour 2015 By Editorial Dept on October 20, 2015 @FLOSSMagazine 1 share 
0 comments 

Legendary underground rapper and entrepreneur MURS is headed out on his Have A Nice Life Tour this fall. The tour will hit nearly 50 cities across the U.S., including stops in New York, Los Angeles, and Nashville. See below for full tour itinerary. MURS is joined on the Have A Nice Life Tour by Red Pill and King Fantastic. 

MURS has recorded a string of revered collaborative albums with Fashawn, 9th Wonder, and Slug of Atmosphere (as Felt). He’s also the owner and founder of the groundbreaking Paid Dues Festival, which highlights the best underground rap on the planet. Having been both an independent artist and signed to a major label, MURS learned the benefits of going indie, and signed with Tech N9ne’s label Strange Music in early 2014. Later that year, he released a collaborative album, ¡MursDay! , with hip hop band and fellow Strange Music signees, ¡MAYDAY!. The collective was excited to work together and create an album that captured the energy both parties always provide when performing live. In May of this year, MURS released his first solo album on the indie imprint, Have A Nice Life , to critical acclaim. The album showcases MURS’ prolific storytelling abilities, and brought a new sound to his music with production by MURS’ childhood friend, Jesse Shatkin (Sia, Kelly Clarkson). 
Don’t miss your chance to see underground icon MURS live!
